articles.title: Number of serious Covid-19 cases in Singapore falls to lowest since July 28 - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The number of serious Covid-19 cases in Singapore has edged downwards to the lowest in over three weeks.

articles.title: 50 Years After Vietnam, Thousands Flee Another Lost American War - The New York Times
